text: Dwight Freeman (born June 29, 1959) is an American former basketball player and coach. He was previously the head coach at Marshall and Norfolk State. At Marshall, he was the first black head basketball coach in Southern Conference history. ==Head coaching record== ==References== ==External links== *Miami bio Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball coaches from Washington, D.C. title: Dwight Freeman
